divs: sighting detailswe were on i75 about 2 wweks ago coming back from boca toward naples\ many lites approx 20 hovering and flashing and putting on a lite show from about 1 mile past i75 toll booth to a approx milemarker 70 along the sides of i75\mostly on our left but also a few on our right\ no sound \multiple colors of flashing lites\ perfectly aligned with each other miles apart\ approx 500 to 1000 ft above ground\ no visible means of support \ just hoovering in one place\ made the same trip a week later and only approx 6 of the same spotted\ in summer of 2005 while driving back thru i75, my wife saw an actual ufo it was taking off from the center median of i75. it was the bright white light that she took notice to as it was rising upward. it was grayish in color. the landing gear looked like claws closing up underneath the vessel. as it closed it looked like a saucer with a bright white light in the center. it moved very fast at at upward slope. she watched it as long as she could from her left side door mirror until it disappeared. it was a matter of maybe 20 seconds as she watched in shock.
